verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

עֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh Make לְךָ֗ le-Cha, שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei thee two חֲצֽוֹצְרֹ֣ת <S%H2689><s%> cha-tzotz-Rot trumpets כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, of silver מִקְשָׁ֖ה <S%H4749><s%> mik-Shah of a whole piece תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu them that thou mayest use לְךָ֙ le-Cha לְמִקְרָ֣א <S%H4744><s%> le-mik-Ra them for the calling הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, of the assembly וּלְמַסַּ֖ע <S%H4550><s%> u-le-mas-Sa' and for the journeying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> Ham-ma-cha-Not. of the camps

וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> ve-ta-ke-'U And when they shall blow בָּהֵ֑ן ba-Hen; וְנֽוֹעֲד֤וּ <S%H3259><s%> ve-no-'a-Du shall assemble אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, all the assembly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach themselves to thee at the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if בְּאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chat [but] with one יִתְקָ֑עוּ <S%H8628><s%> yit-Ka-'u; And if they blow וְנוֹעֲד֤וּ <S%H3259><s%> ve-no-'a-Du shall gather אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֔ים <S%H5387><s%> han-ne-si-'Im, [trumpet] then the princes רָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei [which are] heads אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8628><s%> u-te-ka'-Tem When ye blow תְּרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah; an alarm וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-se-'U shall go forward הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Not, then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <S%H2583><s%> ha-cho-Nim that lie קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah. on the east parts

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֤ם <S%H8628><s%> u-te-ka'-Tem When ye blow תְּרוּעָה֙ <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah an alarm שֵׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit, the second time וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-se-'U shall take their journey הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Not, then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <S%H2583><s%> ha-cho-Nim that lie תֵּימָ֑נָה <S%H8486><s%> tei-Ma-nah; on the south side תְּרוּעָ֥ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah an alarm יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> yit-ke-'U they shall blow לְמַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4550><s%> le-mas-'ei-Hem. for their journeys

וּבְהַקְהִ֖יל <S%H6950><s%> u-ve-hak-Hil is to be gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal; But when the congregation תִּתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> tit-ke-'U ye shall blow וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo without תָרִֽיעוּ׃ <S%H7321><s%> ta-Ri-'u. but ye shall not sound an alarm

וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> yit-ke-'U shall blow בַּֽחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot; with the trumpets וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem לְחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> le-chuk-Kat and they shall be to you for an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-tei-Chem. throughout your generations

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- When תָבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-'u And if ye go מִלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah to war בְּאַרְצְכֶ֗ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tze-Chem, in your land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הַצַּר֙ <S%H6862><s%> hatz-Tzar against הַצֹּרֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> hatz-tzo-Rer the enemy that oppresseth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וַהֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7321><s%> va-ha-re-'o-Tem you then ye shall blow an alarm בַּחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot; with the trumpets וֲנִזְכַּרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H2142><s%> va-niz-kar-Tem, and ye shall be remembered לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God וְנוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3467><s%> ve-no-sha'-Tem and ye shall be saved מֵאֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> me-'o-ye-vei-Chem. from your enemies

וּבְי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom Also in the day שִׂמְחַתְכֶ֥ם <S%H8057><s%> sim-chat-Chem of your gladness וּֽבְמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֮ <S%H4150><s%> u-ve-mo-'a-dei-Chem and in your solemn days וּבְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> u-ve-ra-Shei and in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶם֒ <S%H2320><s%> cha-de-shei-Chem of your months וּתְקַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8628><s%> u-te-ka'-Tem ye shall blow בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֹ֗ת <S%H2689><s%> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot, with the trumpets עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over עֹלֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lo-tei-Chem, over your burnt offerings וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and over זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> ziv-Chei and over the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H8002><s%> shal-mei-Chem; of your peace offerings וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> le-zik-ka-rOn that they may be to you for a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God פ Peh

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַּשָּׁנָ֧ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֛ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit [day] of the second בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni in the second בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> be-'es-Rim And it came to pass on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh; of the month נַעֲלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> na-'a-Lah was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan, that the cloud מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al over מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan from off the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut. of the testimony

וַיִּסְע֧וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U took בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> le-mas-'ei-Hem their journeys מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-Bar out of the wilderness סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai; of Sinai וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> vai-yish-Kon rested הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan and the cloud בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <S%H6290><s%> pa-Ran. of Paran

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U took their journey בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah; And they first עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. of Moses

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-Sa' [place] went דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah In the first לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- over צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'O, army נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> nach-Shon and over his host [was] Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char; of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El [was] Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av [was] Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֵלֽוֹן׃ <S%H2497><s%> che-Lon. of Helon

וְהוּרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-hu-Rad was taken down הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan; And the tabernacle וְנָסְע֤וּ <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-se-'U set forward בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- and the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H1648><s%> ge-re-shOn of Gershon וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons מְרָרִ֔י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri, of Merari נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> no-se-'Ei bearing הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan. the tabernacle ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֗ע <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-Sa', set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- according צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'O, and over his host אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> 'e-li-Tzur [was] Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on; of Simeon שְׁלֻֽמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> she-lu-mi-'El [was] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צוּרִֽי tzu-Ri שַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> shad-Dai. of Zurishaddai

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- was over צְבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va And over the host מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children גָ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad; of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> 'el-ya-Saf [was] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H1845><s%> de-'u-'El. of Deuel

וְנָסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-se-'U set forward הַקְּהָתִ֔ים <S%H6956><s%> hak-ke-ha-Tim, And the Kohathites נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> no-se-'Ei bearing הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash; the sanctuary וְהֵקִ֥ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> ve-he-Ki-mu and [the other] did set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- before בֹּאָֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> bo-'Am. against they came ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֗ע <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-Sa', set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- over צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'O, and over his host אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> 'e-li-sha-Ma' [was] Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud
